details: The script uses Slurm to manage job submission, execution, and resource allocation.
Spack is used for package management and installation.
Boost library is being installed with specific variants and dependencies.
OpenMPI is a dependency for Boost.
Intel compiler is used for building the software.
The script uses 10 CPU cores and 1 GPU.
93GB of memory is allocated for the job.
The script uses the 'ind-gpu-shared' partition in Slurm.
The script is running on the 'expanse' system.
An Intel license is required for the Intel compiler.
The script uses the 'slurm/expanse/current' module for Slurm.
